#summary Things that probably aren't going to change but you should be aware of.

 # In observer mode, can't switch perspectives with your mouse buttons. Instead, use the left and right arrow keys.
 # Can't switch weapons immediately after spinning up with the heavy. This will result in getting "stuck" spun up. Just press 1 again and that should fix it.
